page.title: 15Where and why People Travel.
page.content: We thought it would be interesting to investigate the pattern of peoples movement in and out of the village of Cheriton.We interviewed 111 households Out of these 55 people commute to their place of employment. Of these 25 travel more than 12 miles, 17 more than 6 miles and 13 more than 2 miles. We also asked where people went to do the bulk of their food shopping,as there is only one village shop and village shops find it difficult to compete with supermarkets.42 went to Winchester(8m) 48 to Alresford(3m),7 to Eastleigh(12m) and 5 to Chandlers Ford (11m).The remainder traveled to a variety of places and only a few of the older residents without transport relied solely on the village shop.
